snippet: The mother of Kenneth Bae, who has been incarcerated for nearly a year, expressed thanks to the North Korean government for letting her see her son.
abstract: Myunghee Bae, mother of Kenneth Bae, ailing American missionary serving a 15-year sentence of hard labor in North Korea, thanks North Korean government for allowing her to visit her son in hospital, but is unsuccessful in gaining his release.
lead_paragraph: The mother of Kenneth Bae, who has been incarcerated for nearly a year, expressed thanks to the North Korean government for letting her see her son.

headline.main: Mother of American Imprisoned in North Korea Leaves Without Him
headline.print_headline:
North Korea: Mother of U.S. Missionary
Leaves Without Imprisoned Son
